data DomainSummary

-- | <a>DomainSummary</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dsAutoRenew</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsExpiry</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>dsTransferLock</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   </ul>
domainSummary :: Text -> DomainSummary

-- | Indicates whether the domain is automatically renewed upon expiration.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Valid values: <a>True</a> | <a>False</a>
dsAutoRenew :: Lens' DomainSummary (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
dsDomainName :: Lens' DomainSummary Text

-- | Expiration date of the domain in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
--   
--   Type: Long
dsExpiry :: Lens' DomainSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Indicates whether a domain is locked from unauthorized transfer to
--   another party.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Valid values: <a>True</a> | <a>False</a>
dsTransferLock :: Lens' DomainSummary (Maybe Bool)
data Tag

-- | <a>Tag</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>tagKey</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>tagValue</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
tag :: Tag

-- | The key (name) of a tag.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, space, ".:/=+-@"
--   
--   Constraints: Each key can be 1-128 characters long.
--   
--   Required: Yes
tagKey :: Lens' Tag (Maybe Text)

-- | The value of a tag.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: A-Z, a-z, 0-9, space, ".:/=+-@"
--   
--   Constraints: Each value can be 0-256 characters long.
--   
--   Required: Yes
tagValue :: Lens' Tag (Maybe Text)

data Nameserver

-- | <a>Nameserver</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>nGlueIps</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>nName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
nameserver :: Text -> Nameserver

-- | Glue IP address of a name server entry. Glue IP addresses are required
--   only when the name of the name server is a subdomain of the domain.
--   For example, if your domain is example.com and the name server for the
--   domain is ns.example.com, you need to specify the IP address for
--   ns.example.com.
--   
--   Type: List of IP addresses.
--   
--   Constraints: The list can contain only one IPv4 and one IPv6 address.
--   
--   Parent: <tt>Nameservers</tt>
nGlueIps :: Lens' Nameserver [Text]

-- | The fully qualified host name of the name server.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Constraint: Maximum 255 characterss
--   
--   Parent: <tt>Nameservers</tt>
nName :: Lens' Nameserver Text
data OperationStatus

-- | ERROR
Error :: OperationStatus

-- | FAILED
Failed :: OperationStatus

-- | IN_PROGRESS
InProgress :: OperationStatus

-- | SUBMITTED
Submitted :: OperationStatus

-- | SUCCESSFUL
Successful :: OperationStatus
data DomainAvailability

-- | AVAILABLE
Available :: DomainAvailability

-- | AVAILABLE_PREORDER
AvailablePreorder :: DomainAvailability

-- | AVAILABLE_RESERVED
AvailableReserved :: DomainAvailability

-- | DONT_KNOW
DontKnow :: DomainAvailability

-- | RESERVED
Reserved :: DomainAvailability

-- | UNAVAILABLE
Unavailable :: DomainAvailability

-- | UNAVAILABLE_PREMIUM
UnavailablePremium :: DomainAvailability

-- | UNAVAILABLE_RESTRICTED
UnavailableRestricted :: DomainAvailability

-- | UPDATE_NAMESERVER

data ExtraParam

-- | <a>ExtraParam</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>epName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ExtraParamName</a></li>
--   <li><a>epValue</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
extraParam :: ExtraParamName -> Text -> ExtraParam

-- | Name of the additional parameter required by the top-level domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>DUNS_NUMBER</tt> | <tt>BRAND_NUMBER</tt> |
--   <tt>BIRTH_DEPARTMENT</tt> | <tt>BIRTH_DATE_IN_YYYY_MM_DD</tt> |
--   <tt>BIRTH_COUNTRY</tt> | <tt>BIRTH_CITY</tt> |
--   <tt>DOCUMENT_NUMBER</tt> | <tt>AU_ID_NUMBER</tt> | <tt>AU_ID_TYPE</tt>
--   | <tt>CA_LEGAL_TYPE</tt> | <tt>ES_IDENTIFICATION</tt> |
--   <tt>ES_IDENTIFICATION_TYPE</tt> | <tt>ES_LEGAL_FORM</tt> |
--   <tt>FI_BUSINESS_NUMBER</tt> | <tt>FI_ID_NUMBER</tt> | <tt>IT_PIN</tt>
--   | <tt>RU_PASSPORT_DATA</tt> | <tt>SE_ID_NUMBER</tt> |
--   <tt>SG_ID_NUMBER</tt> | <tt>VAT_NUMBER</tt>
--   
--   Parent: <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
epName :: Lens' ExtraParam ExtraParamName

-- | Values corresponding to the additional parameter names required by
--   some top-level domains.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 2048 characters.
--   
--   Parent: <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
epValue :: Lens' ExtraParam Text

-- | ASSOCIATION
CTAssociation :: ContactType

-- | COMPANY
CTCompany :: ContactType

-- | PERSON
CTPerson :: ContactType

-- | PUBLIC_BODY
CTPublicBody :: ContactType

-- | RESELLER
CTReseller :: ContactType
data ContactDetail

-- | <a>ContactDetail</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>cdAddressLine1</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>

--   <li><a>cdCity</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdContactType</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>ContactType</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdCountryCode</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>CountryCode</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdEmail</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdExtraParams</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>ExtraParam</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>cdFax</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdFirstName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdLastName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdOrganizationName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdPhoneNumber</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdState</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdZipCode</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
contactDetail :: ContactDetail

-- | First line of the contact's address.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdAddressLine1 :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | Second line of contact's address, if any.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
cdAddressLine2 :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The city of the contact's address.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdCity :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates whether the contact is a person, company, association, or
--   public organization. If you choose an option other than
--   <tt>PERSON</tt>, you must enter an organization name, and you can't
--   enable privacy protection for the contact.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>PERSON</tt> | <tt>COMPANY</tt> |
--   <tt>ASSOCIATION</tt> | <tt>PUBLIC_BODY</tt>
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdContactType :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe ContactType)

-- | Code for the country of the contact's address.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdCountryCode :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe CountryCode)

-- | Email address of the contact.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 254 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdEmail :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of name-value pairs for parameters required by certain
--   top-level domains.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Children: <tt>Name</tt>, <tt>Value</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
cdExtraParams :: Lens' ContactDetail [ExtraParam]

-- | Fax number of the contact.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Phone number must be specified in the format "+[country
--   dialing code].[number including any area code]". For example, a US
--   phone number might appear as '"+1.1234567890"'.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
cdFax :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | First name of contact.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdFirstName :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | Last name of contact.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdLastName :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | Name of the organization for contact types other than <tt>PERSON</tt>.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters. Contact type must not be
--   <tt>PERSON</tt>.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
cdOrganizationName :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The phone number of the contact.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Phone number must be specified in the format "+[country
--   dialing code].[number including any area code&gt;]". For example, a US
--   phone number might appear as '"+1.1234567890"'.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdPhoneNumber :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The state or province of the contact's city.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
cdState :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The zip or postal code of the contact's address.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
--   
--   Parents: <tt>RegistrantContact</tt>, <tt>AdminContact</tt>,
--   <tt>TechContact</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
cdZipCode :: Lens' ContactDetail (Maybe Text)
data OperationSummary

-- | <a>OperationSummary</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>osOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>osStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>OperationStatus</a></li>
--   <li><a>osSubmittedDate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>osType</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>OperationType</a></li>
--   </ul>
operationSummary :: Text -> OperationStatus -> OperationType -> UTCTime -> OperationSummary

-- | Identifier returned to track the requested action.
--   
--   Type: String
osOperationId :: Lens' OperationSummary Text

-- | The current status of the requested operation in the system.
--   
--   Type: String
osStatus :: Lens' OperationSummary OperationStatus

-- | The date when the request was submitted.
osSubmittedDate :: Lens' OperationSummary UTCTime

-- | Type of the action requested.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>REGISTER_DOMAIN</tt> | <tt>DELETE_DOMAIN</tt> |
--   <tt>TRANSFER_IN_DOMAIN</tt> | <tt>UPDATE_DOMAIN_CONTACT</tt> |
--   <tt>UPDATE_NAMESERVER</tt> | <tt>CHANGE_PRIVACY_PROTECTION</tt> |
--   <tt>DOMAIN_LOCK</tt>
osType :: Lens' OperationSummary OperationType
instance Eq DomainSummary
instance Ord DomainSummary
instance Read DomainSummary
instance Show DomainSummary
instance Eq Tag
instance Ord Tag
instance Read Tag
instance Show Tag
instance Eq ExtraParamName
instance Ord ExtraParamName
instance Read ExtraParamName
instance Show ExtraParamName
instance Generic ExtraParamName
instance Enum ExtraParamName
instance Eq Nameserver
instance Ord Nameserver
instance Read Nameserver
instance Show Nameserver
instance Eq OperationStatus
instance Ord OperationStatus
instance Read OperationStatus
instance Show OperationStatus
instance Generic OperationStatus
instance Enum OperationStatus
instance Eq DomainAvailability
instance Ord DomainAvailability

-- | This operation updates the contact information for a particular
--   domain. Information for at least one contact (registrant,
--   administrator, or technical) must be supplied for update.
--   
--   If the update is successful, this method returns an operation ID that
--   you can use to track the progress and completion of the action. If the
--   request is not completed successfully, the domain registrant will be
--   notified by email.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-UpdateDomainContact.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.UpdateDomainContact
data UpdateDomainContact

-- | <a>UpdateDomainContact</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udcAdminContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>udcDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>udcRegistrantContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>udcTechContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateDomainContact :: Text -> UpdateDomainContact

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
udcAdminContact :: Lens' UpdateDomainContact (Maybe ContactDetail)

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
udcDomainName :: Lens' UpdateDomainContact Text

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
udcRegistrantContact :: Lens' UpdateDomainContact (Maybe ContactDetail)

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
udcTechContact :: Lens' UpdateDomainContact (Maybe ContactDetail)
data UpdateDomainContactResponse

-- | <a>UpdateDomainContactResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udcrOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateDomainContactResponse :: Text -> UpdateDomainContactResponse

-- | Identifier for tracking the progress of the request. To use this ID to
--   query the operation status, use GetOperationDetail.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
udcrOperationId :: Lens' UpdateDomainContactResponse Text
instance Eq UpdateDomainContact
instance Read UpdateDomainContact
instance Show UpdateDomainContact
instance Eq UpdateDomainContactResponse
instance Ord UpdateDomainContactResponse
instance Read UpdateDomainContactResponse
instance Show UpdateDomainContactResponse
instance Monoid UpdateDomainContactResponse
instance IsString UpdateDomainContactResponse
instance FromJSON UpdateDomainContactResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateDomainContact
instance ToJSON UpdateDomainContact
instance ToHeaders UpdateDomainContact
instance ToQuery UpdateDomainContact
instance ToPath UpdateDomainContact


-- | This operation updates the specified domain contact's privacy setting.
--   When the privacy option is enabled, personal information such as
--   postal or email address is hidden from the results of a public WHOIS
--   query. The privacy services are provided by the AWS registrar, Gandi.
--   For more information, see the <a>Gandi privacy features</a>.
--   
--   This operation only affects the privacy of the specified contact type
--   (registrant, administrator, or tech). Successful acceptance returns an
--   operation ID that you can use with GetOperationDetail to track the
--   progress and completion of the action. If the request is not completed
--   successfully, the domain registrant will be notified by email.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-UpdateDomainContactPrivacy.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
data UpdateDomainContactPrivacy

-- | <a>UpdateDomainContactPrivacy</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udcpAdminPrivacy</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>udcpDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>udcpRegistrantPrivacy</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>udcpTechPrivacy</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateDomainContactPrivacy :: Text -> UpdateDomainContactPrivacy

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
udcpAdminPrivacy :: Lens' UpdateDomainContactPrivacy (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
udcpDomainName :: Lens' UpdateDomainContactPrivacy Text

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
udcpRegistrantPrivacy :: Lens' UpdateDomainContactPrivacy (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
udcpTechPrivacy :: Lens' UpdateDomainContactPrivacy (Maybe Bool)
data UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse

-- | <a>UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udcprOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateDomainContactPrivacyResponse :: Text -> UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse

-- | Identifier for tracking the progress of the request. To use this ID to
--   query the operation status, use GetOperationDetail.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
udcprOperationId :: Lens' UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse Text
instance Eq UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance Ord UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance Read UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance Show UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance Eq UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse
instance Ord UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse
instance Read UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse
instance Show UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse
instance Monoid UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse
instance IsString UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse
instance FromJSON UpdateDomainContactPrivacyResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance ToJSON UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance ToHeaders UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance ToQuery UpdateDomainContactPrivacy
instance ToPath UpdateDomainContactPrivacy


-- | This operation replaces the current set of name servers for the domain
--   with the specified set of name servers. If you use Amazon Route 53 as
--   your DNS service, specify the four name servers in the delegation set
--   for the hosted zone for the domain.
--   
--   If successful, this operation returns an operation ID that you can use
--   to track the progress and completion of the action. If the request is
--   not completed successfully, the domain registrant will be notified by
--   email.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-UpdateDomainNameservers.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.UpdateDomainNameservers
data UpdateDomainNameservers

-- | <a>UpdateDomainNameservers</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udnDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>udnFIAuthKey</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>udnNameservers</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Nameserver</a>]</li>
--   </ul>
updateDomainNameservers :: Text -> UpdateDomainNameservers

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
udnDomainName :: Lens' UpdateDomainNameservers Text

-- | The authorization key for .fi domains
udnFIAuthKey :: Lens' UpdateDomainNameservers (Maybe Text)

-- | A list of new name servers for the domain.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>Name</tt>, <tt>GlueIps</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
udnNameservers :: Lens' UpdateDomainNameservers [Nameserver]
data UpdateDomainNameserversResponse

-- | <a>UpdateDomainNameserversResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>udnrOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
updateDomainNameserversResponse :: Text -> UpdateDomainNameserversResponse

-- | Identifier for tracking the progress of the request. To use this ID to
--   query the operation status, use GetOperationDetail.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
udnrOperationId :: Lens' UpdateDomainNameserversResponse Text
instance Eq UpdateDomainNameservers
instance Read UpdateDomainNameservers
instance Show UpdateDomainNameservers
instance Eq UpdateDomainNameserversResponse
instance Ord UpdateDomainNameserversResponse
instance Read UpdateDomainNameserversResponse
instance Show UpdateDomainNameserversResponse
instance Monoid UpdateDomainNameserversResponse
instance IsString UpdateDomainNameserversResponse
instance FromJSON UpdateDomainNameserversResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateDomainNameservers
instance ToJSON UpdateDomainNameservers
instance ToHeaders UpdateDomainNameservers
instance ToQuery UpdateDomainNameservers
instance ToPath UpdateDomainNameservers


-- | This operation adds or updates tags for a specified domain.
--   
--   All tag operations are eventually consistent; subsequent operations
--   may not immediately represent all issued operations.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-UpdateTagsForDomain.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.UpdateTagsForDomain
data UpdateTagsForDomain

-- | <a>UpdateTagsForDomain</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>utfdDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>utfdTagsToUpdate</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Tag</a>]</li>
--   </ul>
updateTagsForDomain :: Text -> UpdateTagsForDomain

-- | The domain for which you want to add or update tags.
--   
--   The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Hyphens are allowed only when
--   theyaposre surrounded by letters, numbers, or other hyphens. You
--   canapost specify a hyphen at the beginning or end of a label. To
--   specify an Internationalized Domain Name, you must convert the name to
--   Punycode.
--   
--   Required: Yes
utfdDomainName :: Lens' UpdateTagsForDomain Text

-- | A list of the tag keys and values that you want to add or update. If
--   you specify a key that already exists, the corresponding value will be
--   replaced.
--   
--   Type: A complex type containing a list of tags
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Required: No
--   
--   '&gt; Each tag includes the following elements:
--   
--   Key
--   
--   The key (name) of a tag.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: Unicode characters including alphanumeric, space, and
--   ".:/=+-@"
--   
--   Constraints: Each key can be 1-128 characters long.
--   
--   Required: Yes
--   
--   Value
--   
--   The value of a tag.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Valid values: Unicode characters including alphanumeric, space, and
--   ".:/=+-@"
--   
--   Constraints: Each value can be 0-256 characters long.
--   
--   Required: Yes
utfdTagsToUpdate :: Lens' UpdateTagsForDomain [Tag]
data UpdateTagsForDomainResponse

-- | <a>UpdateTagsForDomainResponse</a> constructor.
updateTagsForDomainResponse :: UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance Eq UpdateTagsForDomain
instance Read UpdateTagsForDomain
instance Show UpdateTagsForDomain
instance Eq UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance Ord UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance Read UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance Show UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance Generic UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance Datatype D1UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance Constructor C1_0UpdateTagsForDomainResponse
instance AWSRequest UpdateTagsForDomain
instance ToJSON UpdateTagsForDomain
instance ToHeaders UpdateTagsForDomain
instance ToQuery UpdateTagsForDomain
instance ToPath UpdateTagsForDomain


-- | This operation transfers a domain from another registrar to Amazon
--   Route 53. When the transfer is complete, the domain is registered with
--   the AWS registrar partner, Gandi.
--   
--   For transfer requirements, a detailed procedure, and information about
--   viewing the status of a domain transfer, see <a>Transferring
--   Registration for aDomain to Amazon Route 53</a> in the Amazon Route 53
--   Developer Guide.
--   
--   If the registrar for your domain is also the DNS service provider for
--   the domain, we highly recommend that you consider transferring your
--   DNS service to Amazon Route 53 or to another DNS service provider
--   before you transfer your registration. Some registrars provide free
--   DNS service when you purchase a domain registration. When you transfer
--   the registration, the previous registrar will not renew your domain
--   registration and could end your DNS service at any time.
--   
--   Caution! If the registrar for your domain is also the DNS service
--   provider for the domain and you don't transfer DNS service to another
--   provider, your website, email, and the web applications associated
--   with the domain might become unavailable. If the transfer is
--   successful, this method returns an operation ID that you can use to
--   track the progress and completion of the action. If the transfer
--   doesn't complete successfully, the domain registrant will be notified
--   by email.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-TransferDomain.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.TransferDomain
data TransferDomain

-- | <a>TransferDomain</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>tdAdminContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdAuthCode</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdAutoRenew</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdDurationInYears</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Natural</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdIdnLangCode</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdNameservers</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Nameserver</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>tdPrivacyProtectAdminContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdPrivacyProtectRegistrantContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdPrivacyProtectTechContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdRegistrantContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>tdTechContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   </ul>
transferDomain :: Text -> Natural -> ContactDetail -> ContactDetail -> ContactDetail -> TransferDomain

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
tdAdminContact :: Lens' TransferDomain ContactDetail

-- | The authorization code for the domain. You get this value from the
--   current registrar.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Required: Yes
tdAuthCode :: Lens' TransferDomain (Maybe Text)

-- | Indicates whether the domain will be automatically renewed (true) or
--   not (false). Autorenewal only takes effect after the account is
--   charged.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Default: true
--   
--   Required: No
tdAutoRenew :: Lens' TransferDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
tdDomainName :: Lens' TransferDomain Text

-- | The number of years the domain will be registered. Domains are
--   registered for a minimum of one year. The maximum period depends on
--   the top-level domain.
--   
--   Type: Integer
--   
--   Default: 1
--   
--   Valid values: Integer from 1 to 10
--   
--   Required: Yes
tdDurationInYears :: Lens' TransferDomain Natural

-- | Reserved for future use.
tdIdnLangCode :: Lens' TransferDomain (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains details for the host and glue IP addresses.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>GlueIps</tt>, <tt>Name</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
tdNameservers :: Lens' TransferDomain [Nameserver]

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: <tt>true</tt>
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
tdPrivacyProtectAdminContact :: Lens' TransferDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: <tt>true</tt>
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
tdPrivacyProtectRegistrantContact :: Lens' TransferDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: <tt>true</tt>
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
tdPrivacyProtectTechContact :: Lens' TransferDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
tdRegistrantContact :: Lens' TransferDomain ContactDetail

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
tdTechContact :: Lens' TransferDomain ContactDetail
data TransferDomainResponse

-- | <a>TransferDomainResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>tdrOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
transferDomainResponse :: Text -> TransferDomainResponse

-- | Identifier for tracking the progress of the request. To use this ID to
--   query the operation status, use GetOperationDetail.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
tdrOperationId :: Lens' TransferDomainResponse Text
instance Eq TransferDomain
instance Read TransferDomain
instance Show TransferDomain
instance Eq TransferDomainResponse
instance Ord TransferDomainResponse
instance Read TransferDomainResponse
instance Show TransferDomainResponse
instance Monoid TransferDomainResponse
instance IsString TransferDomainResponse
instance FromJSON TransferDomainResponse
instance AWSRequest TransferDomain
instance ToJSON TransferDomain
instance ToHeaders TransferDomain
instance ToQuery TransferDomain
instance ToPath TransferDomain


-- | This operation returns the AuthCode for the domain. To transfer a
--   domain to another registrar, you provide this value to the new
--   registrar.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-RetrieveDomainAuthCode.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.RetrieveDomainAuthCode

-- | <a>RetrieveDomainAuthCode</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rdacDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
retrieveDomainAuthCode :: Text -> RetrieveDomainAuthCode

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
rdacDomainName :: Lens' RetrieveDomainAuthCode Text

-- | <a>RetrieveDomainAuthCodeResponse</a> constructor.
--

--

--   </ul>

--   
--   Type: String
rdacrAuthCode :: Lens' RetrieveDomainAuthCodeResponse Text

instance ToPath RetrieveDomainAuthCode


-- | This operation registers a domain. Domains are registered by the AWS
--   registrar partner, Gandi. For some top-level domains (TLDs), this
--   operation requires extra parameters.
--   
--   When you register a domain, Amazon Route 53 does the following:
--   
--   Creates a Amazon Route 53 hosted zone that has the same name as the
--   domain. Amazon Route 53 assigns four name servers to your hosted zone
--   and automatically updates your domain registration with the names of
--   these name servers. Enables autorenew, so your domain registration
--   will renew automatically each year. We'll notify you in advance of the
--   renewal date so you can choose whether to renew the registration.
--   Optionally enables privacy protection, so WHOIS queries return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the
--   information you entered for registrant, admin, and tech contacts. If
--   registration is successful, returns an operation ID that you can use
--   to track the progress and completion of the action. If the request is
--   not completed successfully, the domain registrant is notified by
--   email. Charges your AWS account an amount based on the top-level
--   domain. For more information, see <a>Amazon Route 53 Pricing</a>.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-RegisterDomain.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.RegisterDomain
data RegisterDomain

-- | <a>RegisterDomain</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rdAdminContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdAutoRenew</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdDurationInYears</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Natural</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdIdnLangCode</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdPrivacyProtectAdminContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdPrivacyProtectRegistrantContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdPrivacyProtectTechContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdRegistrantContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>rdTechContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   </ul>
registerDomain :: Text -> Natural -> ContactDetail -> ContactDetail -> ContactDetail -> RegisterDomain

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
rdAdminContact :: Lens' RegisterDomain ContactDetail

-- | Indicates whether the domain will be automatically renewed
--   (<tt>true</tt>) or not (<tt>false</tt>). Autorenewal only takes effect
--   after the account is charged.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Default: <tt>true</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
rdAutoRenew :: Lens' RegisterDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
rdDomainName :: Lens' RegisterDomain Text

-- | The number of years the domain will be registered. Domains are
--   registered for a minimum of one year. The maximum period depends on
--   the top-level domain.
--   
--   Type: Integer
--   
--   Default: 1
--   
--   Valid values: Integer from 1 to 10
--   
--   Required: Yes
rdDurationInYears :: Lens' RegisterDomain Natural

-- | Reserved for future use.
rdIdnLangCode :: Lens' RegisterDomain (Maybe Text)

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: <tt>true</tt>
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
rdPrivacyProtectAdminContact :: Lens' RegisterDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: <tt>true</tt>
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
rdPrivacyProtectRegistrantContact :: Lens' RegisterDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | Whether you want to conceal contact information from WHOIS queries. If
--   you specify true, WHOIS ("who is") queries will return contact
--   information for our registrar partner, Gandi, instead of the contact
--   information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
--   
--   Default: <tt>true</tt>
--   
--   Valid values: <tt>true</tt> | <tt>false</tt>
--   
--   Required: No
rdPrivacyProtectTechContact :: Lens' RegisterDomain (Maybe Bool)

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
rdRegistrantContact :: Lens' RegisterDomain ContactDetail

-- | Provides detailed contact information.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
--   
--   Required: Yes
rdTechContact :: Lens' RegisterDomain ContactDetail
data RegisterDomainResponse

-- | <a>RegisterDomainResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>rdrOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
registerDomainResponse :: Text -> RegisterDomainResponse

-- | Identifier for tracking the progress of the request. To use this ID to
--   query the operation status, use GetOperationDetail.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: Maximum 255 characters.
rdrOperationId :: Lens' RegisterDomainResponse Text
instance Eq RegisterDomain
instance Read RegisterDomain
instance Show RegisterDomain
instance Eq RegisterDomainResponse
instance Ord RegisterDomainResponse
instance Read RegisterDomainResponse
instance Show RegisterDomainResponse
instance Monoid RegisterDomainResponse
instance IsString RegisterDomainResponse
instance FromJSON RegisterDomainResponse
instance AWSRequest RegisterDomain
instance ToJSON RegisterDomain
instance ToHeaders RegisterDomain
instance ToQuery RegisterDomain
instance ToPath RegisterDomain


-- | This operation returns all of the tags that are associated with the
--   specified domain.
--   
--   All tag operations are eventually consistent; subsequent operations
--   may not immediately represent all issued operations.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-ListTagsForDomain.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.ListTagsForDomain
data ListTagsForDomain

-- | <a>ListTagsForDomain</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ltfdDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
listTagsForDomain :: Text -> ListTagsForDomain

-- | The domain for which you want to get a list of tags.
ltfdDomainName :: Lens' ListTagsForDomain Text
data ListTagsForDomainResponse

-- | <a>ListTagsForDomainResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ltfdrTagList</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Tag</a>]</li>
--   </ul>
listTagsForDomainResponse :: ListTagsForDomainResponse

-- | A list of the tags that are associated with the specified domain.
--   
--   Type: A complex type containing a list of tags
--   
--   Each tag includes the following elements.
--   
--   Key
--   
--   The key (name) of a tag.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Value
--   
--   The value of a tag.
--   
--   Type: String
ltfdrTagList :: Lens' ListTagsForDomainResponse [Tag]

instance Ord ListTagsForDomain

instance Monoid ListTagsForDomain

-- | This operation returns the operation IDs of operations that are not
--   yet complete.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-ListOperations.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.ListOperations
data ListOperations

-- | <a>ListOperations</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>loMarker</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>loMaxItems</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Int</a></li>
--   </ul>
listOperations :: ListOperations

-- | For an initial request for a list of operations, omit this element. If
--   the number of operations that are not yet complete is greater than the
--   value that you specified for <tt>MaxItems</tt>, you can use
--   <tt>Marker</tt> to return additional operations. Get the value of
--   <tt>NextPageMarker</tt> from the previous response, and submit another
--   request that includes the value of <tt>NextPageMarker</tt> in the
--   <tt>Marker</tt> element.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Required: No
loMarker :: Lens' ListOperations (Maybe Text)

-- | Number of domains to be returned.
--   
--   Type: Integer
--   
--   Default: 20
--   
--   Constraints: A value between 1 and 100.
--   
--   Required: No
loMaxItems :: Lens' ListOperations (Maybe Int)
data ListOperationsResponse

-- | <a>ListOperationsResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>lorNextPageMarker</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>lorOperations</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>OperationSummary</a>]</li>
--   </ul>
listOperationsResponse :: ListOperationsResponse

-- | If there are more operations than you specified for <tt>MaxItems</tt>
--   in the request, submit another request and include the value of
--   <tt>NextPageMarker</tt> in the value of <tt>Marker</tt>.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Parent: <tt>Operations</tt>
lorNextPageMarker :: Lens' ListOperationsResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Lists summaries of the operations.
--   
--   Type: Complex type containing a list of operation summaries
--   
--   Children: <tt>OperationId</tt>, <a>Status</a>, <tt>SubmittedDate</tt>,
--   <tt>Type</tt>
lorOperations :: Lens' ListOperationsResponse [OperationSummary]
instance Eq ListOperations
instance Ord ListOperations
instance Read ListOperations
instance Show ListOperations
instance Eq ListOperationsResponse
instance Read ListOperationsResponse
instance Show ListOperationsResponse
instance AWSPager ListOperations
instance FromJSON ListOperationsResponse
instance AWSRequest ListOperations
instance ToJSON ListOperations
instance ToHeaders ListOperations
instance ToQuery ListOperations
instance ToPath ListOperations


-- | This operation returns all the domain names registered with Amazon
--   Route 53 for the current AWS account.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-ListDomains.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.ListDomains
data ListDomains

-- | <a>ListDomains</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ldMarker</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>ldMaxItems</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Int</a></li>
--   </ul>
listDomains :: ListDomains

-- | For an initial request for a list of domains, omit this element. If
--   the number of domains that are associated with the current AWS account
--   is greater than the value that you specified for <tt>MaxItems</tt>,
--   you can use <tt>Marker</tt> to return additional domains. Get the
--   value of <tt>NextPageMarker</tt> from the previous response, and
--   submit another request that includes the value of
--   <tt>NextPageMarker</tt> in the <tt>Marker</tt> element.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The marker must match the value specified in the previous
--   request.
--   
--   Required: No
ldMarker :: Lens' ListDomains (Maybe Text)

-- | Number of domains to be returned.
--   
--   Type: Integer
--   
--   Default: 20
--   
--   Constraints: A numeral between 1 and 100.
--   
--   Required: No
ldMaxItems :: Lens' ListDomains (Maybe Int)
data ListDomainsResponse

-- | <a>ListDomainsResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ldrDomains</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>DomainSummary</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>ldrNextPageMarker</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
listDomainsResponse :: ListDomainsResponse

-- | A summary of domains.
--   
--   Type: Complex type containing a list of domain summaries.
--   
--   Children: <tt>AutoRenew</tt>, <tt>DomainName</tt>, <tt>Expiry</tt>,
--   <tt>TransferLock</tt>
ldrDomains :: Lens' ListDomainsResponse [DomainSummary]

-- | If there are more domains than you specified for <tt>MaxItems</tt> in
--   the request, submit another request and include the value of
--   <tt>NextPageMarker</tt> in the value of <tt>Marker</tt>.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Parent: <tt>Operations</tt>
ldrNextPageMarker :: Lens' ListDomainsResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq ListDomains
instance Ord ListDomains
instance Read ListDomains
instance Show ListDomains
instance Eq ListDomainsResponse
instance Read ListDomainsResponse
instance Show ListDomainsResponse
instance AWSPager ListDomains
instance FromJSON ListDomainsResponse
instance AWSRequest ListDomains
instance ToJSON ListDomains
instance ToHeaders ListDomains
instance ToQuery ListDomains
instance ToPath ListDomains


-- | This operation returns the current status of an operation that is not
--   completed.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-GetOperationDetail.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.GetOperationDetail
data GetOperationDetail

-- | <a>GetOperationDetail</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>godOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
getOperationDetail :: Text -> GetOperationDetail

-- | The identifier for the operation for which you want to get the status.
--   Amazon Route 53 returned the identifier in the response to the
--   original request.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Required: Yes
godOperationId :: Lens' GetOperationDetail Text
data GetOperationDetailResponse

-- | <a>GetOperationDetailResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>godrDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>godrMessage</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>godrOperationId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>godrStatus</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>OperationStatus</a></li>
--   <li><a>godrSubmittedDate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>godrType</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>OperationType</a></li>
--   </ul>
getOperationDetailResponse :: GetOperationDetailResponse

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
godrDomainName :: Lens' GetOperationDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Detailed information on the status including possible errors.
--   
--   Type: String
godrMessage :: Lens' GetOperationDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The identifier for the operation.
--   
--   Type: String
godrOperationId :: Lens' GetOperationDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The current status of the requested operation in the system.
--   
--   Type: String
godrStatus :: Lens' GetOperationDetailResponse (Maybe OperationStatus)

-- | The date when the request was submitted.
godrSubmittedDate :: Lens' GetOperationDetailResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The type of operation that was requested.
--   
--   Type: String
godrType :: Lens' GetOperationDetailResponse (Maybe OperationType)
instance Eq GetOperationDetail
instance Ord GetOperationDetail
instance Read GetOperationDetail
instance Show GetOperationDetail
instance Monoid GetOperationDetail

instance Show GetOperationDetailResponse
instance FromJSON GetOperationDetailResponse
instance AWSRequest GetOperationDetail
instance ToJSON GetOperationDetail
instance ToHeaders GetOperationDetail
instance ToQuery GetOperationDetail
instance ToPath GetOperationDetail


-- | This operation returns detailed information about the domain. The
--   domain's contact information is also returned as part of the output.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-GetDomainDetail.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.GetDomainDetail
data GetDomainDetail

-- | <a>GetDomainDetail</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gddDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
getDomainDetail :: Text -> GetDomainDetail

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
gddDomainName :: Lens' GetDomainDetail Text
data GetDomainDetailResponse

-- | <a>GetDomainDetailResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>gddrAbuseContactEmail</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrAbuseContactPhone</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrAdminContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrAdminPrivacy</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrAutoRenew</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrCreationDate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrDnsSec</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrExpirationDate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrNameservers</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Nameserver</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>gddrRegistrantContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrRegistrantPrivacy</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrRegistrarName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrRegistrarUrl</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrRegistryDomainId</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrReseller</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrStatusList</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>
--   <li><a>gddrTechContact</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>ContactDetail</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrTechPrivacy</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Bool</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrUpdatedDate</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a>
--   <a>UTCTime</a></li>
--   <li><a>gddrWhoIsServer</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
getDomainDetailResponse :: Text -> ContactDetail -> ContactDetail -> ContactDetail -> GetDomainDetailResponse

-- | Email address to contact to report incorrect contact information for a
--   domain, to report that the domain is being used to send spam, to
--   report that someone is cybersquatting on a domain name, or report some
--   other type of abuse.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrAbuseContactEmail :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Phone number for reporting abuse.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrAbuseContactPhone :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides details about the domain administrative contact.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
gddrAdminContact :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse ContactDetail

-- | Specifies whether contact information for the admin contact is
--   concealed from WHOIS queries. If the value is <tt>true</tt>, WHOIS
--   ("who is") queries will return contact information for our registrar
--   partner, Gandi, instead of the contact information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
gddrAdminPrivacy :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Bool)

-- | Specifies whether the domain registration is set to renew
--   automatically.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
gddrAutoRenew :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Bool)

-- | The date when the domain was created as found in the response to a
--   WHOIS query. The date format is Unix time.
gddrCreationDate :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | Reserved for future use.
gddrDnsSec :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrDomainName :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse Text

-- | The date when the registration for the domain is set to expire. The
--   date format is Unix time.
gddrExpirationDate :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The name of the domain.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrNameservers :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse [Nameserver]

-- | Provides details about the domain registrant.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
gddrRegistrantContact :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse ContactDetail

-- | Specifies whether contact information for the registrant contact is
--   concealed from WHOIS queries. If the value is <tt>true</tt>, WHOIS
--   ("who is") queries will return contact information for our registrar
--   partner, Gandi, instead of the contact information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
gddrRegistrantPrivacy :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Bool)

-- | Name of the registrar of the domain as identified in the registry.
--   Amazon Route 53 domains are registered by registrar Gandi. The value
--   is '"GANDI SAS"'.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrRegistrarName :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Web address of the registrar.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrRegistrarUrl :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Reserved for future use.
gddrRegistryDomainId :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | Reseller of the domain. Domains registered or transferred using Amazon
--   Route 53 domains will have '<a>Amazon</a>' as the reseller.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrReseller :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | An array of domain name status codes, also known as Extensible
--   Provisioning Protocol (EPP) status codes.
--   
--   ICANN, the organization that maintains a central database of domain
--   names, has developed a set of domain name status codes that tell you
--   the status of a variety of operations on a domain name, for example,
--   registering a domain name, transferring a domain name to another
--   registrar, renewing the registration for a domain name, and so on. All
--   registrars use this same set of status codes.
--   
--   For a current list of domain name status codes and an explanation of
--   what each code means, go to the <a>ICANN website</a> and search for
--   'epp status codes'. (Search on the ICANN website; web searches
--   sometimes return an old version of the document.)
--   
--   Type: Array of String
gddrStatusList :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse [Text]

-- | Provides details about the domain technical contact.
--   
--   Type: Complex
--   
--   Children: <tt>FirstName</tt>, <tt>MiddleName</tt>, <tt>LastName</tt>,
--   <a>ContactType</a>, <tt>OrganizationName</tt>, <tt>AddressLine1</tt>,
--   <tt>AddressLine2</tt>, <tt>City</tt>, <tt>State</tt>,
--   <a>CountryCode</a>, <tt>ZipCode</tt>, <tt>PhoneNumber</tt>,
--   <tt>Email</tt>, <tt>Fax</tt>, <tt>ExtraParams</tt>
gddrTechContact :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse ContactDetail

-- | Specifies whether contact information for the tech contact is
--   concealed from WHOIS queries. If the value is <tt>true</tt>, WHOIS
--   ("who is") queries will return contact information for our registrar
--   partner, Gandi, instead of the contact information that you enter.
--   
--   Type: Boolean
gddrTechPrivacy :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Bool)

-- | The last updated date of the domain as found in the response to a
--   WHOIS query. The date format is Unix time.
gddrUpdatedDate :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The fully qualified name of the WHOIS server that can answer the WHOIS
--   query for the domain.
--   
--   Type: String
gddrWhoIsServer :: Lens' GetDomainDetailResponse (Maybe Text)
instance Eq GetDomainDetail
instance Ord GetDomainDetail
instance Read GetDomainDetail
instance Show GetDomainDetail
instance Monoid GetDomainDetail
instance IsString GetDomainDetail

instance Show GetDomainDetailResponse

-- | This operation sets the transfer lock on the domain (specifically the
--   <tt>clientTransferProhibited</tt> status) to prevent domain transfers.
--   Successful submission returns an operation ID that you can use to
--   track the progress and completion of the action. If the request is not
--   completed successfully, the domain registrant will be notified by
--   email.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-EnableDomainTransferLock.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.EnableDomainTransferLock

--   </ul>
enableDomainTransferLock :: Text -> EnableDomainTransferLock

--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--

--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
edtlDomainName :: Lens' EnableDomainTransferLock Text

-- | This operation configures Amazon Route 53 to automatically renew the
--   specified domain before the domain registration expires. The cost of
--   renewing your domain registration is billed to your AWS account.
--   
--   The period during which you can renew a domain name varies by TLD. For
--   a list of TLDs and their renewal policies, see <a>"Renewal,
--   restoration, anddeletion times"</a> on the website for our registrar
--   partner, Gandi. Route 53 requires that you renew before the end of the
--   renewal period that is listed on the Gandi website so we can complete
--   processing before the deadline.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-EnableDomainAutoRenew.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.EnableDomainAutoRenew
data EnableDomainAutoRenew

-- | <a>EnableDomainAutoRenew</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>edarDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
enableDomainAutoRenew :: Text -> EnableDomainAutoRenew
edarDomainName :: Lens' EnableDomainAutoRenew Text
data EnableDomainAutoRenewResponse

-- | <a>EnableDomainAutoRenewResponse</a> constructor.
enableDomainAutoRenewResponse :: EnableDomainAutoRenewResponse

instance Ord EnableDomainAutoRenew
instance Read EnableDomainAutoRenew
instance Show EnableDomainAutoRenew

-- | This operation removes the transfer lock on the domain (specifically
--   the <tt>clientTransferProhibited</tt> status) to allow domain
--   transfers. We recommend you refrain from performing this action unless
--   you intend to transfer the domain to a different registrar. Successful
--   submission returns an operation ID that you can use to track the
--   progress and completion of the action. If the request is not completed
--   successfully, the domain registrant will be notified by email.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-DisableDomainTransferLock.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.DisableDomainTransferLock

--

--   <li><a>ddtlDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
disableDomainTransferLock :: Text -> DisableDomainTransferLock

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
ddtlDomainName :: Lens' DisableDomainTransferLock Text

-- | This operation disables automatic renewal of domain registration for
--   the specified domain.
--   
--   Caution! Amazon Route 53 doesn't have a manual renewal process, so if
--   you disable automatic renewal, registration for the domain will not be
--   renewed when the expiration date passes, and you will lose control of
--   the domain name.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-DisableDomainAutoRenew.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.DisableDomainAutoRenew
data DisableDomainAutoRenew

-- | <a>DisableDomainAutoRenew</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>ddarDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
disableDomainAutoRenew :: Text -> DisableDomainAutoRenew
ddarDomainName :: Lens' DisableDomainAutoRenew Text
data DisableDomainAutoRenewResponse

-- | <a>DisableDomainAutoRenewResponse</a> constructor.
disableDomainAutoRenewResponse :: DisableDomainAutoRenewResponse
instance Eq DisableDomainAutoRenew
instance Ord DisableDomainAutoRenew
instance Read DisableDomainAutoRenew
instance Show DisableDomainAutoRenew
instance Monoid DisableDomainAutoRenew
instance IsString DisableDomainAutoRenew
instance Eq DisableDomainAutoRenewResponse
instance Ord DisableDomainAutoRenewResponse

-- | This operation deletes the specified tags for a domain.
--   
--   All tag operations are eventually consistent; subsequent operations
--   may not immediately represent all issued operations.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-DeleteTagsForDomain.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.DeleteTagsForDomain
data DeleteTagsForDomain

-- | <a>DeleteTagsForDomain</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>dtfdDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>dtfdTagsToDelete</a> <tt>::</tt> [<a>Text</a>]</li>
--   </ul>
deleteTagsForDomain :: Text -> DeleteTagsForDomain

-- | The domain for which you want to delete one or more tags.
--   
--   The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Hyphens are allowed only when
--   theyaposre surrounded by letters, numbers, or other hyphens. You
--   canapost specify a hyphen at the beginning or end of a label. To
--   specify an Internationalized Domain Name, you must convert the name to
--   Punycode.
--   
--   Required: Yes
dtfdDomainName :: Lens' DeleteTagsForDomain Text

-- | A list of tag keys to delete.
--   
--   Type: A list that contains the keys of the tags that you want to
--   delete.
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Required: No
--   
--   '&gt;
dtfdTagsToDelete :: Lens' DeleteTagsForDomain [Text]
data DeleteTagsForDomainResponse

-- | <a>DeleteTagsForDomainResponse</a> constructor.
deleteTagsForDomainResponse :: DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance Eq DeleteTagsForDomain
instance Ord DeleteTagsForDomain
instance Read DeleteTagsForDomain
instance Show DeleteTagsForDomain
instance Eq DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance Ord DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance Read DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance Show DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance Generic DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance Datatype D1DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance Constructor C1_0DeleteTagsForDomainResponse
instance AWSRequest DeleteTagsForDomain
instance ToJSON DeleteTagsForDomain
instance ToHeaders DeleteTagsForDomain
instance ToQuery DeleteTagsForDomain
instance ToPath DeleteTagsForDomain


-- | This operation checks the availability of one domain name. You can
--   access this API without authenticating. Note that if the availability
--   status of a domain is pending, you must submit another request to
--   determine the availability of the domain name.
--   
--   
--   <a>http://docs.aws.amazon.com/Route53/latest/APIReference/api-CheckDomainAvailability.html</a>
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains.CheckDomainAvailability
data CheckDomainAvailability

-- | <a>CheckDomainAvailability</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>cdaDomainName</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Text</a></li>
--   <li><a>cdaIdnLangCode</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>Maybe</a> <a>Text</a></li>
--   </ul>
checkDomainAvailability :: Text -> CheckDomainAvailability

-- | The name of a domain.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Default: None
--   
--   Constraints: The domain name can contain only the letters a through z,
--   the numbers 0 through 9, and hyphen (-). Internationalized Domain
--   Names are not supported.
--   
--   Required: Yes
cdaDomainName :: Lens' CheckDomainAvailability Text

-- | Reserved for future use.
cdaIdnLangCode :: Lens' CheckDomainAvailability (Maybe Text)
data CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse

-- | <a>CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse</a> constructor.
--   
--   The fields accessible through corresponding lenses are:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><a>cdarAvailability</a> <tt>::</tt> <a>DomainAvailability</a></li>
--   </ul>
checkDomainAvailabilityResponse :: DomainAvailability -> CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse

-- | Whether the domain name is available for registering.
--   
--   You can only register domains designated as <tt>AVAILABLE</tt>.
--   
--   Type: String
--   
--   Valid values:
--   
--   <tt>AVAILABLE</tt> – The domain name is available.
--   <tt>AVAILABLE_RESERVED</tt> – The domain name is reserved under
--   specific conditions. <tt>AVAILABLE_PREORDER</tt> – The domain name is
--   available and can be preordered. <tt>UNAVAILABLE</tt> – The domain
--   name is not available. <tt>UNAVAILABLE_PREMIUM</tt> – The domain name
--   is not available. <tt>UNAVAILABLE_RESTRICTED</tt> – The domain name is
--   forbidden. <tt>RESERVED</tt> – The domain name has been reserved for
--   another person or organization. <tt>DONT_KNOW</tt> – The TLD registry
--   didn't reply with a definitive answer about whether the domain name is
--   available. Amazon Route 53 can return this response for a variety of
--   reasons, for example, the registry is performing maintenance. Try
--   again later.
cdarAvailability :: Lens' CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse DomainAvailability
instance Eq CheckDomainAvailability
instance Ord CheckDomainAvailability
instance Read CheckDomainAvailability
instance Show CheckDomainAvailability
instance Eq CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse
instance Read CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse
instance Show CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse
instance FromJSON CheckDomainAvailabilityResponse
instance AWSRequest CheckDomainAvailability
instance ToJSON CheckDomainAvailability
instance ToHeaders CheckDomainAvailability
instance ToQuery CheckDomainAvailability
instance ToPath CheckDomainAvailability


-- | Pending
module Network.AWS.Route53Domains
